sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" /* Now using object destructuring to pull out the individual keys in the `props` object that gets passed to this component. https://tylermcginnis.com/videos/object-array-destructuring/ */ const DetailCard = ({id, gigName, resource, date, rating, venueId, venueName, venueCity, venueCapacity, venueState, audienceName, audienceId, spotName, spotId}) => { return (
{gigName}

{date ? date : ""}

{rating ? rating : ""}

{venueName ? venueName : ""}

{venueCity ? venueCity : ""}

{venueState ? venueState : ""}

{venueCapacity ? venueCapacity : ""}

{audienceName ? audienceName : ""}

{spotName ? spotName : ""}

{ Details }
) } export default DetailCard
